CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK( Tracking_Date__c ), ISBLANK( Tracking_Date_LP__c ) ), NULL, DATE(1900,01,01) + MAX( BLANKVALUE(Tracking_Date__c , DATE(1900, 01, 01)) - DATE(1900, 01, 01), BLANKVALUE(Tracking_Date_LP__c, DATE(1900, 01, 01)) - DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates the next date the station is likely to to off air. Works for both LP and HP
CustomField.label: Tracking Date (All)
